name: Sweet and Spicy Turkey Sandwich
author: Snowspiral
summary: This sandwich has a good combination of sweet and spicy flavor.
ingredients: 2 slices (1/2 inch thick) hearty country bread
directions: Heat a small skillet over medium heat
Butter one side of each of the bread slices with one teaspoon butter
Place one slice, butter side down, in the skillet
Top with the turkey and cheese slices
Place the second slice of bread on top, butter side up
When the first side of the sandwich is golden brown, turn and brown the other side, 3 to 5 minutes per side, or until the cheese begins to melt
Remove sandwich to a plate and top with strawberry preserves, or serve the preserves on the side
